name: Anne Driemel
content: Prof. Dr. Anne Driemel [Informatik-Abteilung V] University of Bonn · Institute of Computer Science · Algorithms and Complexity Sidebar Home People Research Research Seminar Teaching Portfolio By semester (including past and future semesters) Current Semester (WiSe 2025/26) Bachelor BA-INF 032 - Algorithmen und Berechnungskomplexität I BA-INF 011 - Logik und diskrete Strukturen Master MA-INF 1218 - Algorithms and Uncertainty MA-INF 1323 - Computational Topology MA-INF 1203 - Discrete and Computational Geometry Prof. Dr. Anne Driemel Address Universität Bonn Institut für Informatik V Friedrich-Hirzebruch-Allee 8 53115 Bonn Phone+49 (228) 73 - 69 683 Email lastname-at-cs-dot-uni-bonn-dot-de Office Room 2.060 Office HoursBy appointment Research interests Discrete and Computational Geometry Algorithms and Data structures Trajectory and Time Series Analysis Publications Google Scholar DBLP ArXiv Teaching I supervise theses in Computer Science and Mathematics. You can find a list of potential Master thesis topics here. For Bachelor thesis topics, please inquire by email.
